p: Total antioxidant activity of root fractions and aerial parts EOs was measured according to standard curve of FeSO 4. Total root extract had the greatest reducing capacity (881.5 mmol Fe 2+/100 g), which was more than vitamin E (313.7 mmol Fe 2+/100 g), and comparable with BHA (880.3 mol Fe 2+/100 g). The flowers/fruits EO had potent reducing capacity (686.6 mmol Fe 2+/100 g) higher than vitamin E. The lowest antioxidant activity was observed for HE and methanol (ME) fractions ( Goodarzi et al., 2016a).
